title: No emote mision
body: I heard from a friend that there was supposed to be a mission to give you an emote. I did not get any such mission. was there something I had to do before preseason to get this emote?

replies.body:
Hey MangoInfinity1!

The emote mission that went out was related to veteran rewards. 

You can read more about veteran rewards in the [Preseason Update FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908-Preseason-Update-FAQ).

>**Q: Are there any other rewards for veterans coming this preseason?**

>**A**: We're planning to give out exclusive emotes **based on how many hours you've put in since the beginning of League**. Playing approximately 500 hours gets you the Defender of the League emote, at around 1,500 hours gets you the Champion of the League emote, and 2,500 hours gets you the ultra-rare Conqueror of the League emote. **The cutoff for game hours is August 31, 2017**.
Heya, the emote he might be referring to is a veteran emote.  I checked into this for you just in case, but this specific account was not eligible.  :(  Sorry friend!
